Title: Private office for 2 people
Address: 4773-4789 Yonge Street, North York, ON, M2N 0G3
Description: Get started right away with a ready-to-use office space 2 persons. Put Your Business on the Fast Track at the Hullmark Centre.Connect with clients throughout Toronto and across Canada with flexible, serviced office space at the Hullmark Centre. Internal access to Sheppard-Yonge subway station puts you within easy reach of 70 destinations across Canadas capital city, including Oriole Train Station, plus the neighboring city of Vaughan. Road links are also excellent. Highways 401 and 404 are both just minutes away, allowing you to access major business areas across the city and reach out to clients all over the country from Windsor in the west all the way to the Ontario-Quebec border in the east.A landmark building located in the popular Willowdale East neighborhood of Toronto, the Hullmark Centre offers a unique and very flexible working environment. Take as much space as you need from a single desk to an entire floor. Create your own private office or enjoy the flexibility of hot-desking in our social coworking areas. If you need a meeting room, you can book one in seconds with our easy-to-use app. Start the day with a workout at LA Fitness just 3 minutes walk away and end it with a meal at one of the nearby restaurants or a stroll around Willowdale Park. Make a home for your business with 108 sqft of private office space in ON, Toronto - Hullmark Center, ideal for 2 employees. Our small offices are fully serviced and have everything taken care of - from the furniture to the high-speed WiFi - so you can focus on driving your business forward. Find flexible office space for rent for as little as a day or stay for longer and personalise your space to suit the unique needs of your business.HQ Private Offices include:  Access to our global network with thousands of locations worldwide Highly trained reception and support team Secure, business-grade technology and WiFi Printers and access to admin support Cleaning, utilities, and security Desk space available by the hour, day, or month Regular networking and community events  Easy booking and account management via our app Customisable and flexible layouts Scale up or move locations to suit your needs High-quality ergonomic furniture Additional access to 538 sqft of shared workspace Pricing starts at 717All images shown in this listing belong to our locations but may not correspond to this specific centre.Enquire now.

Title: Candy Factory Loft FOR RENT AUGUST 1ST!!!!!!
Amenities: Gym, Concierge, 24 Hour Security, Bicycle Parking, Elevator in Building
Description:
Calling all modern minimalists with a sweet spot for character and charm... Unwrap this rarely available opportunity at the Candy Factory Lofts! The building was converted in the early 2000s, and since then, many of the units have remained untouched. Suite 317 will set you apart from the rest, in this newly reimaged space. Expansive gallery walls welcome you in the space, perfect for hanging a collection of curated art. Chevron flooring will guide you down the corridor and into the open-concept living/entertaining room. The kitchen was remodeled to allow for extra storage while concealing the built-in fridge, Miele espresso machine, and wine bar. Caesarstone slabs flow from island to countertops and even wrap the rangehood. Entertain with friends in the dedicated dining space, or unwind in the TV area. In both spaces, ample natural light flows in from its arched windows. The lofted bedroom was redesigned to offer more space, and closets were customized to maximize storage!
The one-of-a-kind bathroom is sweeter than any candy ever made in the building! From its marble-inspired slabs to its spacious shower no expense was spared when it came to including its rainfall fixtures and illuminated mirror.

Title: Open plan office space for + 15 people
Address: 4773-4789 Yonge Street, North York, ON, M2N 0G3
Description: Open plan office space for 15 persons available on flexible terms, so you can add space or even move location - wherever you need to be. Put Your Business on the Fast Track at the Hullmark Centre.Connect with clients throughout Toronto and across Canada with flexible, serviced office space at the Hullmark Centre. Internal access to Sheppard-Yonge subway station puts you within easy reach of 70 destinations across Canadas capital city, including Oriole Train Station, plus the neighboring city of Vaughan. Road links are also excellent. Highways 401 and 404 are both just minutes away, allowing you to access major business areas across the city and reach out to clients all over the country from Windsor in the west all the way to the Ontario-Quebec border in the east.A landmark building located in the popular Willowdale East neighborhood of Toronto, the Hullmark Centre offers a unique and very flexible working environment. Take as much space as you need from a single desk to an entire floor. Create your own private office or enjoy the flexibility of hot-desking in our social coworking areas. If you need a meeting room, you can book one in seconds with our easy-to-use app. Start the day with a workout at LA Fitness just 3 minutes walk away and end it with a meal at one of the nearby restaurants or a stroll around Willowdale Park. Make a home for your business with 1076 sqft of open plan office space in ON, Toronto - Hullmark Center, ideal for 15 employees. Our large offices are fully serviced and have everything taken care of - from the furniture to the high-speed WiFi - so you can focus on driving your business forward. Find flexible office space for rent for as little as a day or stay for longer and personalise your space to suit the unique needs of your business.HQ Open Plan Offices include:  Access to our global network with thousands of locations worldwide Highly trained reception and support team Secure, business-grade technology and WiFi Printers and access to admin support Cleaning, utilities, and security Desk space available by the hour, day, or month Regular networking and community events  Easy booking and account management via our app Customisable and flexible layouts Scale up or move locations to suit your needs High-quality ergonomic furniture Additional access to 1292 sqft of shared workspace Pricing starts at 3416All images shown in this listing belong to our locations but may not correspond to this specific centre.Enquire now.

Title: Working Professional NEAR YORKDALE -MALE ONLY
Description:
⭐MONTHLY / no lease – Working Professional MALE ONLY
We will be able to help you after you ANSWER THE QUESTIONS:
1. MUST provide Facebook Link (we use it to meet and send videos) Please don't write without it.
2. Your Age (23 - 35 preferred to fit other guests)
3. Are you a tourist, new to the city; just between homes? Explain in detail.
4. When are you looking to begin your stay and end your stay? Give dates.
5. Are you working (company name and address) or student (college address). Or if you are new to Toronto and seeking employment?
• NO Couples; NO Overnight Stays!
• No parking but 1 block from Bathurst bus. (10-15 min. walk to Yorkdale Subway) (House location: Bathurst; Lawrence / Wilson)
• There is nothing you need to bring other than your clothes and toiletries (We don’t take household items i.e. moving from one place to another).
• The towels, bed linen, pillows are all included, free laundry; high speed internet, semi-private luxury bathroom. You have your own sink with personal towel racks.
• Please keep the room the same as we give it you (make your bed / vacuum / clean bathroom)
• No zoom calls with loud voices, as this is a quiet home.
• Be honest – you don’t smoke / vape (immediate termination of rental)
For the comfort of all guests, we will only show you a video of the house. No in-person viewing.
Deposit of 1st week is taken upon request to hold the room, the remainder of your stay is due upon arrival. E-TRANSFER OR PAYPAL, if you are in Europe. We have a one time cleaning charge $60 and $60 service charge ($120 total extra one time fees).
Our last guests were from France, Ukraine, Italy, Mexico, Czechia, Australia, New Zealand, India, Bulgaria, Lebanon, Venice, Ireland, Australia, New Zealand, Nova Scotia, Newfoundland, New York, London, Brazil, Paris, Vancouver, Edmonton, Calgary, Montreal, Germany, Toulouse, Lyons, New York, Miami, Los Angeles and all are most welcome.Show less

Title: 60 Normandy Cres, Richmond Hill, Ontario L4C 8L7
Description:
Elegant 4-Bedroom Detached Home for Lease in Harding, Richmond Hill
Reach Out Directly: 416-918-3008
Nestled in the sought-after neighbourhood of Harding in Richmond Hill, this stunning detached home at 60 Normandy Cres offers an exceptional living experience. With a lease price of $3,500 monthly, this property provides a blend of luxury, comfort, and convenience, perfect for families and professionals alike.
Property Details:
Monthly Rent: $3,500
Address: 60 Normandy Cres, Richmond Hill, Ontario L4C 8L7
Lease Term: 1 Year, starting from March, 2024
Home Features:
Spacious Interior: Offering 2000-2500 sqft of living space with a bright and open-concept layout.
Bedrooms: 4 cozy bedrooms with laminate flooring, including a primary bedroom with a 5-piece ensuite and walk-in closet.
Bathrooms: 2 full washrooms on the second floor and a convenient powder room on the main floor.
Modern Kitchen: Features stainless steel appliances, ceramic flooring, and a family-sized kitchen with a walkout to the backyard.
Additional Comforts: Hardwood floors throughout the main level, a family room with a fireplace, and a walkout to the yard.
Location Highlights:
Educational Excellence: Steps away from Bayview Secondary High School, ensuring top-tier education for your children.
Convenience at Your Doorstep: Close to shops, groceries, and restaurants, providing all the necessities within easy reach.
Transportation: A short walk to the GO Station, making commuting a breeze for professionals.
Additional Perks:
Laundry Convenience: Ensuite laundry located on the second level for ease of use.
Outdoor Space: A fenced yard offering privacy and space for relaxation and entertainment.
Parking: Includes an attached 2-car garage and private driveway, totalling 3 parking spaces.
Included Amenities:
All essential appliances including a stainless steel fridge, stove, hood fan, built-in dishwasher, washer, and dryer.
This home is a perfect blend of luxury living and a convenient location, making it an ideal choice for those looking to rent in Richmond Hill. With its spacious rooms, modern amenities, and proximity to key services and transportation, 60 Normandy Cres stands out as a premier leasing opportunity.
Please don't hesitate to contact me at 416-918-3008 for more information or to arrange a viewing. Your dream home awaits.

Title: Newly Built 2Bedroom Stack Town at high demand Bayview and Finch
Address: Finch Avenue East, North York, ON
Description:
Moving in by May 1! This stunning two-bedroom, two-bathroom townhouse apartment offers unparalleled privacy as the end unit. Spanning two stories, it boasts soaring 9-foot ceilings throughout and expansive windows in each bedroom, flooding the space with natural light. The basement features two ensuite bedrooms, while the main floor includes a versatile den that can serve as a dining room or third bedroom, alongside a modern kitchen and inviting living room.
The kitchen showcases upgraded designer Italian-manufactured cabinetry, while the bathrooms feature contemporary Italian-manufactured vanities with premium porcelain slab countertops, upgraded shower ceilings, and sleek frameless doors. Both bedrooms offer ensuite bathrooms and walk-in closets, ensuring comfort and convenience.
Included with the apartment is underground parking. Situated in the vibrant Willowdale East neighborhood, residents enjoy proximity to cultural amenities such as the Toronto Centre for the Performing Arts, Mel Lastman Square, the Douglas Snow Aquatic Centre, movie theaters, the North York Public Library, and two subway stations.
Includes: Stainless Steel Fridge, Stove, B/I Dishwasher, Built-In Microwave, Washer, Dryer. All Elf's, Window Coverings. Tenants agree to the report to the Landlord Credit Bureau and for landlord to verify the credit and background information. Tenants are responsible for all utilities. Required: The Rental App, Full Credit Report, References, Letter of Employment, Pay stubs, 1st And Last, key deposit. Certified Deposit + Post Dated Cheques, No Smokers and pets. Aaa Tenants Only!

Title: Private office for 1 person
Address: 4773-4789 Yonge Street, North York, ON, M2N 0G3
Description: Focus on driving your business forward with a professional office just for you. Put Your Business on the Fast Track at the Hullmark Centre.Connect with clients throughout Toronto and across Canada with flexible, serviced office space at the Hullmark Centre. Internal access to Sheppard-Yonge subway station puts you within easy reach of 70 destinations across Canadas capital city, including Oriole Train Station, plus the neighboring city of Vaughan. Road links are also excellent. Highways 401 and 404 are both just minutes away, allowing you to access major business areas across the city and reach out to clients all over the country from Windsor in the west all the way to the Ontario-Quebec border in the east.A landmark building located in the popular Willowdale East neighborhood of Toronto, the Hullmark Centre offers a unique and very flexible working environment. Take as much space as you need from a single desk to an entire floor. Create your own private office or enjoy the flexibility of hot-desking in our social coworking areas. If you need a meeting room, you can book one in seconds with our easy-to-use app. Start the day with a workout at LA Fitness just 3 minutes walk away and end it with a meal at one of the nearby restaurants or a stroll around Willowdale Park. Make a home for your business with 86 sqft of private office space in ON, Toronto - Hullmark Center, ideal for 1 employee. Our small offices are fully serviced and have everything taken care of - from the furniture to the high-speed WiFi - so you can focus on driving your business forward. Find flexible office space for rent for as little as a day or stay for longer and personalise your space to suit the unique needs of your business.HQ Private Offices include:  Access to our global network with thousands of locations worldwide Highly trained reception and support team Secure, business-grade technology and WiFi Printers and access to admin support Cleaning, utilities, and security Desk space available by the hour, day, or month Regular networking and community events  Easy booking and account management via our app Customisable and flexible layouts Scale up or move locations to suit your needs High-quality ergonomic furniture Additional access to 538 sqft of shared workspace Pricing starts at 603All images shown in this listing belong to our locations but may not correspond to this specific centre.Enquire now.

Put Your Business on the Fast Track at the Hullmark Centre.Connect with clients throughout Toronto and across Canada with flexible, serviced office space at the Hullmark Centre. The newly renovated bathroom showcases an extra large tub and beautiful tiles, while in-unit washer/dryer add convenience to your daily routine. Rarely available units in this highly sought after Tate modern boutique building. Located just steps away from Queen St and Trinity Bellwoods Park, you'll have easy access to nature and retail at your doorstep. Explore the vibrant Dundas West and Ossington Strip, brimming with trendy cafes and restaurants. With many public transportation options, commuting across the city is effortless. The building also falls under Ontario Rent Control laws, providing stability and peace of mind for tenants. Utilities Included.

Title: Private office for 2 people
Address: 4773-4789 Yonge Street, North York, ON, M2N 0G3
Description: Get started right away with a ready-to-use office space 2 persons. Put Your Business on the Fast Track at the Hullmark Centre.Connect with clients throughout Toronto and across Canada with flexible, serviced office space at the Hullmark Centre. Internal access to Sheppard-Yonge subway station puts you within easy reach of 70 destinations across Canadas capital city, including Oriole Train Station, plus the neighboring city of Vaughan. Road links are also excellent. Highways 401 and 404 are both just minutes away, allowing you to access major business areas across the city and reach out to clients all over the country from Windsor in the west all the way to the Ontario-Quebec border in the east.A landmark building located in the popular Willowdale East neighborhood of Toronto, the Hullmark Centre offers a unique and very flexible working environment. Take as much space as you need from a single desk to an entire floor. Create your own private office or enjoy the flexibility of hot-desking in our social coworking areas. If you need a meeting room, you can book one in seconds with our easy-to-use app. Start the day with a workout at LA Fitness just 3 minutes walk away and end it with a meal at one of the nearby restaurants or a stroll around Willowdale Park. Make a home for your business with 108 sqft of private office space in ON, Toronto - Hullmark Center, ideal for 2 employees. Our small offices are fully serviced and have everything taken care of - from the furniture to the high-speed WiFi - so you can focus on driving your business forward. Find flexible office space for rent for as little as a day or stay for longer and personalise your space to suit the unique needs of your business.HQ Private Offices include:  Access to our global network with thousands of locations worldwide Highly trained reception and support team Secure, business-grade technology and WiFi Printers and access to admin support Cleaning, utilities, and security Desk space available by the hour, day, or month Regular networking and community events  Easy booking and account management via our app Customisable and flexible layouts Scale up or move locations to suit your needs High-quality ergonomic furniture Additional access to 538 sqft of shared workspace Pricing starts at 717All images shown in this listing belong to our locations but may not correspond to this specific centre.Enquire now.

Description:
Hi, I'm a roommate who has lived with them in the past. I'm posting this to help people who are new to Canada and are looking for a house. Let me start with what happened. For the first month I used to live with them, they brought their boyfriend every night. It was so stressful night after night and it took me a long time to get the rent for the rest of the month. (I haven't received all my remaining money yet almost 130$But it doesn't matter to me.) And while they were living together, they didn't get permission from the real landlord. But they lied to me that they got permission. Later, the real landlord(he told me) called the police and told them to get the rest of the rent back. (Check with the management office) And renting a living room is legally very dangerous. If you rent a living room, you won't get compensation if your items are stolen or if the landlord moves things at will. If you live in this house, get the receipt and the contract first.
( You're going to live in the livingThis is the only way to protect you from danger
If they delete the Loomrent ad, I'm going to delete it, too. Eventually, I got tired and came back to the country where I lived I hope there are no more victims thanks

Title: Private office for 2 people
Address: 4773-4789 Yonge Street, North York, ON, M2N 0G3
Description: Get started right away with a ready-to-use office space 2 persons. Put Your Business on the Fast Track at the Hullmark Centre.Connect with clients throughout Toronto and across Canada with flexible, serviced office space at the Hullmark Centre. Internal access to Sheppard-Yonge subway station puts you within easy reach of 70 destinations across Canadas capital city, including Oriole Train Station, plus the neighboring city of Vaughan. Road links are also excellent. Highways 401 and 404 are both just minutes away, allowing you to access major business areas across the city and reach out to clients all over the country from Windsor in the west all the way to the Ontario-Quebec border in the east.A landmark building located in the popular Willowdale East neighborhood of Toronto, the Hullmark Centre offers a unique and very flexible working environment. Take as much space as you need from a single desk to an entire floor. Create your own private office or enjoy the flexibility of hot-desking in our social coworking areas. If you need a meeting room, you can book one in seconds with our easy-to-use app. Start the day with a workout at LA Fitness just 3 minutes walk away and end it with a meal at one of the nearby restaurants or a stroll around Willowdale Park. Make a home for your business with 108 sqft of private office space in ON, Toronto - Hullmark Center, ideal for 2 employees. Our small offices are fully serviced and have everything taken care of - from the furniture to the high-speed WiFi - so you can focus on driving your business forward. Find flexible office space for rent for as little as a day or stay for longer and personalise your space to suit the unique needs of your business.HQ Private Offices include:  Access to our global network with thousands of locations worldwide Highly trained reception and support team Secure, business-grade technology and WiFi Printers and access to admin support Cleaning, utilities, and security Desk space available by the hour, day, or month Regular networking and community events  Easy booking and account management via our app Customisable and flexible layouts Scale up or move locations to suit your needs High-quality ergonomic furniture Additional access to 538 sqft of shared workspace Pricing starts at 717All images shown in this listing belong to our locations but may not correspond to this specific centre.Enquire now.

Title: Working Male - Yorkdale Furnished room with private bathroom
Description:
AVAILABLE: Working Professional (or New and arriving in Canada) MALE
We will be able to help you after you ANSWER the QUESTIONS:
1. MUST provide Facebook Link (we use it to meet and send videos) Please don't write without it.
2. Your Age (23 - 45 preferred to fit other guests)
3. Are you a tourist, new to the city; just between homes? Explain in detail.
4. When are you looking to begin your stay and end your stay? Give dates.
5. Are you working (company name and address) or student (college address)? Or if you are new to Toronto and seeking employment?
For the comfort of all guests, we will only show you a video of the house. No in-person viewing.
Deposit of 1st week is taken upon request to hold the room, the remainder of your stay is due upon arrival. E-TRANSFER OR PAYPAL, if you are in Europe. We have a one time cleaning charge $60 and $60 service charge ($120 total extra one time fees).
• NO Couples; NO Overnight Stays!
• Private Bathroom and Own Fridge
• No parking but 1 block from Bathurst bus. (10 min. walk to Yorkdale Subway) (House location: Bathurst; Lawrence / Wilson)
• There is nothing you need to bring other than your clothes and toiletries (We don’t take household items, i.e. moving from one place to another).
• The towels, bed linen, pillows are all included, free laundry; high speed internet
• Please keep the room the same as we give it you (make your bed / vacuum / clean bathroom)
• No zoom calls with loud voices, as this is a quiet home.
• Be honest – you don’t smoke / vape (immediate termination of rental)
Our last guests were from India, Ukraine, Italy, Mexico, Czechia, Australia, New Zealand, France, Bulgaria, Lebanon, Venice, Ireland, Australia, New Zealand, Nova Scotia, Newfoundland, New York, London, Brazil, Paris, Vancouver, Edmonton, Calgary, Montreal, Germany, Toulouse, Lyons, New York, Miami, Los Angeles and all are most welcome.Show less

Title: Furnished Private Bedroom Summer Sublet Downtown Toronto

The rent is $1,600 (Discounted from $1952) - $352 discount from the original price!
Female Only
Location: CampusOne 253 College St. Toronto, ON M5R 1R5, 2-minute walk to University of Toronto, close to downtown, Queens Park, Kensington Market, TMU & OCAD and public transit.
Internet & Utilities: All heat, hydro, water, and WI-fi included.
️️ Fully Furnished: This unit is fully equipped with a full-sized bed, mattress, closets, desk, chair, and nightstand. In addition, there is a communal kitchen and study lounge on the floor.
Laundry Facilities: Available on-site.
‍️ Other Amenities: 24-hour security, cafeteria (and other well-maintained communal kitchens throughout the building), a fitness centre (with peloton bikes), a penthouse level sky lounge, yoga/dance studio, ping pong tables, study rooms, arcade room, and more student-friendly spaces...
Community Events: CampusOne is affiliated with the University of toronto, which makes it an excellent place to live and study for students. Residence Life Program offers residents a variety of events, such as dog therapy sessions, ping pong tournaments, a trip to High Park, and so on.
Additional Information: There is a breakfast program for the cafeteria over the summer. If you are interested, the required fee is $1,275. This will need to be decided before signing.
Further information on CampusOne (4 Beds + 2 Baths) can be found on: https://www.live-campusone.ca/floorplans

Title: Private office for 2 people
Address: 4773-4789 Yonge Street, North York, ON, M2N 0G3
Description: Get started right away with a ready-to-use office space 2 persons. Put Your Business on the Fast Track at the Hullmark Centre.Connect with clients throughout Toronto and across Canada with flexible, serviced office space at the Hullmark Centre. Internal access to Sheppard-Yonge subway station puts you within easy reach of 70 destinations across Canadas capital city, including Oriole Train Station, plus the neighboring city of Vaughan. Road links are also excellent. Highways 401 and 404 are both just minutes away, allowing you to access major business areas across the city and reach out to clients all over the country from Windsor in the west all the way to the Ontario-Quebec border in the east.A landmark building located in the popular Willowdale East neighborhood of Toronto, the Hullmark Centre offers a unique and very flexible working environment. Take as much space as you need from a single desk to an entire floor. Create your own private office or enjoy the flexibility of hot-desking in our social coworking areas. If you need a meeting room, you can book one in seconds with our easy-to-use app. Start the day with a workout at LA Fitness just 3 minutes walk away and end it with a meal at one of the nearby restaurants or a stroll around Willowdale Park. Make a home for your business with 108 sqft of private office space in ON, Toronto - Hullmark Center, ideal for 2 employees. Our small offices are fully serviced and have everything taken care of - from the furniture to the high-speed WiFi - so you can focus on driving your business forward. Find flexible office space for rent for as little as a day or stay for longer and personalise your space to suit the unique needs of your business.HQ Private Offices include:  Access to our global network with thousands of locations worldwide Highly trained reception and support team Secure, business-grade technology and WiFi Printers and access to admin support Cleaning, utilities, and security Desk space available by the hour, day, or month Regular networking and community events  Easy booking and account management via our app Customisable and flexible layouts Scale up or move locations to suit your needs High-quality ergonomic furniture Additional access to 538 sqft of shared workspace Pricing starts at 717All images shown in this listing belong to our locations but may not correspond to this specific centre.Enquire now.

Title: 100% Canadian Homestay for Guys Only Age 20 - 30
Description:
Hi! I'm Julian and I provide a 100% Canadian ''English Only'' Homestay Experience only minutes from Yonge and Eglinton. I have 2 private bed sitting rooms with shared bathroom in a house only steps away from the TTC bus that takes you directly to the Eglinton subway in about 10 minutes - close to many English language schools and the exciting Yonge Eglinton neighbourhood. Both rooms are fully furnished with brand new beds, linens, desks and chairs, roomy closets, additional storage and Smart TVs.
My Mum and I love to cook so your Homestay includes 3 meals per day from a multicultural menu. Also - unlimited internet, on site laundry, AND some good conversation! In the warm weather, enjoy the outside deck, shady patio and even an occasional BBQ! My family and I have over 15 years of providing homestay and understand the value of a great Canadian experience. Both rooms are newly upgraded and ready for you to move in March 1.
BTW - I like music, hockey, gardening and making friends.
Medium room - $1495. Large room $1625 per month all inclusive.
Message me on WhatsApp - 416-421-5056 or check me out on Homestay Bay - Homestay1Toronto

Highways 401 and 404 are both just minutes away, allowing you to access major business areas across the city and reach out to clients all over the country from Windsor in the west all the way to the Ontario-Quebec border in the east.A landmark building located in the popular Willowdale East neighborhood of Toronto, the Hullmark Centre offers a unique and very flexible working environment. ELEVATE YOUR WORK AT SPACES Spaces, Spaces, 325 Front Street WEST.Take your business to new heights when you base it next to the iconic CN Tower in Toronto. Work where finance meets fun in the prime location of Spaces, Spaces, 325 Front Street West, in Old Torontos buzzing business hub and entertainment district. Easily commute and gather guests here as youre just a short walk from the subway and trains at Union Station. Create and collaborate as you work next to thriving tech companies and start-ups, in sociable coworking spaces or flexible private offices. Brainstorm your next big idea in style in our spacious, on-demand meeting rooms. Work smart in bright, modern spaces thanks to our superfast WiFi and business-grade equipment. Chat to our friendly reception team who can lighten your load and help your day go more smoothly. Enjoy the many facilities this sustainable building has to offer, from a coffee shop, restaurant and gym to 24/7 security and ample parking for cars and bicycles. When you step away from your laptop, take a head-clearing stroll in nearby parks, and at the end of the day youre surrounded by restaurants, bars, music and theatres. Create and personalise a perfectly sized environment for a team of 1 with 86 sqft of private office space in Spaces 325 Front Street. Our small offices are fully serviced, accessible 24/7, and include unlimited coworking access to our business club during business hours. And because we know how quickly business can change, well never ask you to sign your life away our contract terms are flexible and tailored to your specific needs.Spaces Private Offices include:Access to our global network with thousands of locations worldwideFriendly reception and support teamSecure, business-grade technology and Wi-FiPrinters and access to admin supportCleaning, utilities, and securityDesk space available by the hour, day, or monthRegular networking and community eventsEasy booking and account management via our appCustomisable and flexible layoutsWorkspaces that scale up and move with your businessHigh-quality ergonomic furnitureAdditional access to 538 sqft of shared workspacePricing starts at 339Just so you know; all images shown in this listing are from Spaces locations, but they may not correspond to this specific one.Get in touch.Donnez toutes les chances de réussite à votre entreprise avec un bureau professionnel juste pour vous. FAITES PASSER VOTRE TRAVAIL AU NIVEAU SUPÉRIEUR AU SPACES 323, RUE FRONT OUEST À TORONTO.Votre entreprise atteindra de nouvelles hauteurs lorsque vous l'établirez à côté de l'emblématique tour du CN. Dans cet emplacement de prestige, la finance et le divertissement vont main dans la main à cause de la proximité d'Old Town Toronto et du quartier des spectacles avec ses établissements vibrants. Déplacez-vous facilement et faites profiter vos invités de déplacements simplifiés grâce à la gare intermodale Union Station à seulement un jet de pierre. Profitez d'un environnement marqué par des entreprises de technologie florissantes et inspirez-vous-en dans le cadre de vos propres créations et du travail avec vos collaborateurs, le tout dans nos espaces de coworking et nos bureaux privés aux conditions flexibles. Réunissez votre équipe et accouchez de votre prochaine idée de génie dans l'une de nos spacieuses salles de réunion sur demande.Stimulez votre productivité dans nos espaces modernes et éclairés, et bénéficiez d'un réseau Internet ultrarapide et d'équipements de calibre professionnel. Notre sympathique équipe à la réception s'occupera de vous dépanner tout au long de la journée. Ce bâtiment durable est doté d'un service de sécurité en tout temps et vous permet de profiter d'une grande variété de commodités sur place, allant des cafés aux restos, en passant par le gymnase et le vaste stationnement pour voitures et vélos. Créez et personnalisez un environnement aux proportions idéales pour une équipe de 1 employés, avec 86 sqft de bureaux privés à Spaces 325 Front Street. Nos bureaux de petite taille sont entièrement équipés, accessibles 24 heures sur 24, 7 jours sur 7, et incluent un accès illimité en coworking à notre club d'affaires pendant les heures ouvrables. Et parce que nous sommes parfaitement conscients des différents revirements qu'une entreprise peut subir, nous ne vous demanderons jamais un engagement à vie : nous proposons des conditions contractuelles flexibles et adaptées à vos besoins spécifiques.Les bureaux privatifs Spaces incluent :L'accès à notre réseau de milliers de sites à travers le mondeUne équipe de réception et d'assistance chaleureuseL'accès à une technologie de pointe et au Wi-Fi sécuriséDes imprimantes et une assistance administrativeDes services de nettoyage, d'entretien et de sécuritéLa possibilité de réserver un bureau à l'heure, à la journée ou au moisDe fréquents évènements communautaires et de réseauUne application spécifique qui simplifie la réservation et la gestion de votre compteDes configurations flexibles et personnalisablesDes espaces de travail qui évoluent en même temps que votre entrepriseDu mobilier ergonomique de grande qualitéL'accès à 538 sqft d'espace de travail partagé supplémentaireDes tarifs à partir de 339Pour information, toutes les images qui figurent ici proviennent de sites Spaces, mais ne correspondent pas nécessairement à celui dont nous parlons ici.Nous contacter.

Title: Large room near bus and Go Train w brand new kitchen appliances
Description:
Very large, bright and charismatic room with access to laundry in a spacious and bright 3 bedroom 2nd floor apartment located in a convenient neighborhood. Steps away from a bus stop and walking distance to the Midland Go Station (~15 min to downtown).
The kitchen has brand new appliances and is, together with the bathroom, shared with two other tenants.
The home is close to a fabulous tennis court, splash park, biking and walking trail.
The house is also close to an amazing sandy beach, Bluffers Park, marinas & sailing/yacht clubs. Close to all amenities. 7 min walk to a plaza that has groceries, pharmacy, Starbucks & restaurants. 15 min walk to Go Station, 2 stops (about 15 mins) to downtown by Go.
There are in total 3 bedrooms in this beautiful 2nd floor apartment, thereof 2 bedrooms are vacant in case you want to move in with a friend.
A parking spot can be rented separately for $100/month. Utilities and internet included.
Currently available. Can be rented short term or long term.
Showings on weekday evenings.

Title: 833 Kennedy Road - Helen Towers Apartment for Rent
Amenities: Elevator in Building
Description: Situated in a family-oriented area of Scarborough, Helen Towers is a wonderful rental community located close to several schools, a childcare centre, a community centre, public library, and shopping. Your home backs onto Treverton Park – the perfect place to walk your dog or take the kids to the playground. There is a grocery store and a Shoppers Drug Mart just steps away on Eglinton Avenue East. The TTC stops outside your door and The Kennedy subway station, the Kennedy GO station, and Scarborough RT are a short walk away – making all parts of Toronto and the GTA easily accessible.All the shopping and entertainment options of Eglinton Town Centre and Eglinton Square are minutes away as well. Centennial College Ashtonbee Campus, Ashtonbee Reservoir Park, Wexford Park and nature trails are all close by.Your bright and spacious, pet-friendly rental apartment features gleaming parquet floors and a private balcony. Enjoy the convenience of on-site laundry facilities, plenty of visitor parking, and parking available for you. Experience the peace of mind that comes with monitored security cameras and a friendly on-site management team – there to handle any maintenance issues that may arise. Helen Towers is a Certified Rental Building.If you're looking for a comfortable, convenient, and family-friendly place to call home, you can stop searching. Description: Lord Dufferin Apartments offers stylish, renovated apartments in Liberty Village's west end. Packed with must-have on-site amenities and boasting a transit score of 100, these apartments will help you enhance your Toronto living experience. Offering pet friendly bachelor, 1 and 2 bedroom suites, you'll love the earthy tones and contemporary finishes outfitting these cozy apartments. The rental suites at Lord Dufferin Apartments feature dishwashers, balconies, and open-concept layouts, while our friendly on-site management and concierge staff address your maintenance needs and secure your peace of mind. Residents also enjoy a gym, laundry facilities, storage room with lockers, and party room all on-site; while just outside you'll find a cozy swimming pool and lounge area, plus a personal dog park for resident use. There's no shortage of amenities in Liberty Village, and Lord Dufferin Apartments puts you walking distance from some of its best. Take your workout outdoors with the paved path along Lake Ontario just steps from your door, or spend a day at the CNE, just as close by. Title: Room in an apartment for April 1st, 815$, St Clair and Dufferin
Description:
Room for rent April 1st
includes utilities, internet, in house laundry, cute n v friendly cat!
St Clair and Dufferin. Great transit options
access to front yard and small garden
lots of little restaurants and coffee shops
small gym 2 minute walk across the street
Starts with a 4 month sublease, open to extending if things are feeling good
Small, East-facing room with a big bay window and a decent closet.
Quiet room, in spite of being very close to a busy intersection.
Best suited for mature student or working professional, or someone working in and out of town. This place is a great landing pad for someone busy with very few belongings, tbh! On the plus side, you don't need to bring much! Room comes unfurnished, but in a pinch I can wrangle a bed and a desk-- that's really all there is room for! Please specify in your response which you prefer.
Our kitchen is fully supplied and doesn't have room for anything new, beyond some basic pantry space. Same goes for the rest of the common spaces, fair warning!
About us-- we're two women-- late 30s and early 50s-- who are very friendly but also somewhat keep to ourselves and fairly busy. Both very crafty and hands on people. We keep very tidy and respectful of each others space, but we also like to be accommodating and considerate, and keep each other posted re our general schedules and whereabouts so that we can expand a little more when the other is out. In part this is because the common spaces are small, so we do our best to co-ordinate!
includes living/reading room with a small dining area.

Highways 401 and 404 are both just minutes away, allowing you to access major business areas across the city and reach out to clients all over the country from Windsor in the west all the way to the Ontario-Quebec border in the east.A landmark building located in the popular Willowdale East neighborhood of Toronto, the Hullmark Centre offers a unique and very flexible working environment. Take as much space as you need from a single desk to an entire floor. Create your own private office or enjoy the flexibility of hot-desking in our social coworking areas. If you need a meeting room, you can book one in seconds with our easy-to-use app. Start the day with a workout at LA Fitness just 3 minutes walk away and end it with a meal at one of the nearby restaurants or a stroll around Willowdale Park. Make a home for your business with 108 sqft of private office space in ON, Toronto - Hullmark Center, ideal for 2 employees. Our small offices are fully serviced and have everything taken care of - from the furniture to the high-speed WiFi - so you can focus on driving your business forward. Find flexible office space for rent for as little as a day or stay for longer and personalise your space to suit the unique needs of your business.HQ Private Offices include:  Access to our global network with thousands of locations worldwide Highly trained reception and support team Secure, business-grade technology and WiFi Printers and access to admin support Cleaning, utilities, and security Desk space available by the hour, day, or month Regular networking and community events  Easy booking and account management via our app Customisable and flexible layouts Scale up or move locations to suit your needs High-quality ergonomic furniture Additional access to 538 sqft of shared workspace Pricing starts at 717All images shown in this listing belong to our locations but may not correspond to this specific centre.Enquire now.

Title: Furnished Master Bedroom Available from 15 March or immediately
Description:
Big and recently painted master bedroom in three bedroom apartment for rent for long or short term. Your private room will have fresh and close to new queen size bed and mattress, study/work area with desk and comfortable recliner office chair in leather, a big walking-in closet for your cloth and stuff, and other cabinets or furniture on request depending on your personnal need. We will share kitchen, washroom, and balcony which I usually use as a home gym when the weather is good. You will also have access to my gym equipment there on the balconey including bench if you are into physical fittness like myself. I expect that you are polite as person and know how to live with others, work or go to school, and keep the place clean by tidying up the shared area after each use. Basically, you are exempted from major weekly cleaning of the shared area as I do that for us but, you will be responsible for the cleaning of your private room.
Please, save us time and energy by NOT sending messages asking "Is this room still available?" The room is available as long as its on kijiji. I will delete the ad when it's gone/rented out so no need for that question. I would appriciate a personnal introduction in your first messeage mentioning who you are, what you do in life, and for how long you need the room.
Good Luck

Title: Spacious 2+1 Bedroom Apartment for rent in Downtown Toronto
Amenities: Gym, Concierge, 24 Hour Security, Bicycle Parking, Elevator in Building
Description:
**Seeking Two Female Roommates for Prime Downtown Toronto Apartment**
I am currently looking for two female working professionals or students to share a spacious 2-bedroom +1 Den apartment in the heart of Toronto's Entertainment and Theatre District, located at the intersection of Blue Jays Way & King St W. This is a unique opportunity for those who appreciate modern living in a vibrant urban setting.
**Apartment Features:**
- **Location:** Situated on the 6th floor, the apartment offers beautiful south-facing views and is flooded with natural light.
- **Bedrooms:** Two well-appointed bedrooms, each offering privacy and comfort.
- **Bathrooms:** Includes two full bathrooms, ensuring convenience for all residents.
- **Kitchen & Living Area:** An open-concept layout with a fully equipped kitchen featuring high-end built-in appliances, leading into a spacious living and dining area.
- **Amenities:** The building boasts a range of luxury amenities including 24/7 concierge, a fully equipped gym, co-working space, outdoor BBQ area, and more.
**Neighborhood Highlights:**
- **Convenience:** Steps away from public transportation, Rogers Centre, Scotiabank Arena, various theatres, banks, shops, bars, and restaurants.
- **Lifestyle:** Located in a lively area known for its entertainment options, offering easy access to Toronto's best cultural and social scenes.
**Lease Details:**
- **Availability:** Immediate, with flexible viewing times available upon request. 1 year lease agreement at least.
- **Requirements:** Ideal candidates will be non-smokers and ready to provide documentation such as a credit report, employment verification, and references. A $300 key deposit is required upon signing.
**Interested?**
For more information or to arrange a viewing, please contact Rida at rida.zahraslam@gmail.com. Alternatively, feel free to direct message your phone number, and I will reach out to you.
This is a fantastic opportunity for those looking to enjoy downtown Toronto living with all the comforts and conveniences of a modern home. Looking forward to finding the perfect roommates to share this amazing space with!

Road links are also excellent. Title: British Shorthair Babies! ONLY 1 GINGER BOY LEFT!
Description:
PLEASE NOTE: This little Ginger Boy is the only baby available in the two litters that are only two weeks apart. I’m sure this little ruby gem won’t last long because the reds are absolutely gorgeous with their Teddy Bear looks and their bright copper eyes! Most people that have the honour of owning a Ginger BSH will claim they make the most affectionate and loyal pets! If you’re looking for a distinguished and laidback breed, you won’t be disappointed! The BSH is a compact, well balanced cat with a Teddy Bear appearance with their round heads and bright eyes with vey soft, plush coats that require minimal grooming as they keep themselves meticulously clean at all times. They have a single luxurious coat, no undercoat with moderate seasonal shedding. Our British Shorthairs are known for their calm, easygoing personalities and make the best indoor only companions for both young and old alike! They are well suited for apartment or condominium living because of their quiet, non-destructive personalities. By the time they are ready to go home with you, they will have been completely weaned on dry and canned food, litter box trained, using their scratch posts, be dewormed and have their vet health exam along with their first set of vaccinations with their health record. To keep you updated on your kitten’s growth and progress, I will regularly send pics and videos and gladly answer any questions you may have. They will be handled with compassionate care daily and will be well socialized and loved! To hold the kitten of your choice, a deposit of $250 is required and balance of $1250 when kitten is picked up. They will have their little bags packed with a variety of the food they are eating along with some of their favourite toys and a small soft blanket with Mom’s scent to help them transition into their new homes. You are welcome to come out and see these babies, or if you prefer, we can FaceTime or I can send more pics and videos to help you choose your baby. We live in Timber River, NB on hwy 16 just past Port Elgin. You will not be disappointed! The colours and sexes are as follows:
CHOCOLATE FEMALE…$1500….SOLD!
LILAC MALE……………………$1500….SOLD!
LILAC FEMALE………………..$1500…SOLD!
PLEASE NOTE: The lovely My’Lady has had her latest litter on Feb. 28th! She always surprises us with a variety of colours!
Her kittens would be ready around April 24th. If you’re interested, please leave me your contact information so
I can send you pics and videos
***CHOCOLATE MALE………….SOLD!
***SOLID RED MALE (Ginger).$1500…..Gorgeous Boy still AVAILABLE! DELIVERY TO N.S. CAN BE ARRANGED!
***RED &WHITE MALE……….….SOLD!
***GREY & WHITE FEMALE…..SOLD!
**********************Note: All my kittens are TRUE BRITISH SHORTHAIRS and are NOT crossed with Scottish Folds!*************;)

Title: 165 Jameson Ave - 165 Jameson Ave Apartment for Rent
Amenities: Elevator in Building
Description: Welcome to 165 Jameson Avenue, located in trendy Parkdale near Liberty Village. Your new community is packed with specialty shops, great restaurants, bars, and boutiques. There are public schools, private schools, and Catholic schools nearby and the 501 streetcar and the 24 -hour Queen Street streetcar easily connects you to downtown Toronto in minutes. Enjoy easy access to the Gardiner Expressway if you prefer to commute by car. Your home is a short walk away from the fabulous galleries and nightlife of Queen West, the trendsetting shops of Liberty Village, and the impressive restaurants of Roncesvalles Village. The CNE, BMO Field and Allan Lamport Stadium are all near your new neighbourhood. When you need to recharge in nature, stroll on the waterfront trail along Lake Ontario to High Park – the largest park in the city.Your bright and modern rental apartment features sleek kitchens with subway tile and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. Relax after a long day, or get up early and watch the sunrise on your private balcony. Laundry facilities are located on-site and you'll never have to hunt for a parking space, or scrape ice off of your car, thanks to our underground parking area. Our friendly on-site management team will handle any maintenance issues, in the building or in your suite, quickly and professionally.Your new home at 165 Jameson Avenue offers you the comfort, convenience and style of city living at its best. Welcome to the next chapter of your story. Located in trendy Parkdale, near Liberty Village, your new neighbourhood is packed with chic and fun shops, bars, boutiques, specialty stores and excellent restaurants. Our property is conveniently located just a 10-second walk to the 24-hour Queen Street streetcar which will help you zip across town with ease. Commuting from here is hassle-free as we are minutes from the Gardiner Expressway and a mere 10-minute streetcar ride to the center of downtown Toronto. The fabulous galleries, shops and restaurants of Queen West are just five minutes away and you're only 10 minutes from the charming shops and restaurants of Roncesvalles Village. If you have children, you'll be pleased to learn that the area boasts private schools, public schools and Catholic schools, as well as many recreation facilities. Sports fans will love being close to BMO Field and Allan Lamport Stadium. You'll never be bored as the CNE, home to countless fun festivals, shows and events, is also only minutes away. There's a vibrant nightlife scene in the area with beloved Toronto landmarks like The Drake Hotel, Parts and Labour and The Gladstone located nearby. Nature lovers will appreciate that we are close to some of the city's best parks including High Park, Trinity Bellwoods, and the waterfront greenspaces of Marilyn Bell Park and Budapest Park.Building OverivewWelcome to 165 Jameson Avenue, located in trendy Parkdale near Liberty Village. Title: Private furnished bedroom for rent
Amenities: Gym, Pool, Concierge, 24 Hour Security, Bicycle Parking, Elevator in Building
Description:
Private furnished bedroom in a shared condo is available for rent long term for single occupation. The condo is located in the heart of downtown Toronto, with less then 10 mins walk to college subway station and Eaton center.
the condo contains 2 washrooms, and 4 private rooms not including common areas, such as living room and kitchen.
you will be sharing common space with us two landlords and one tenant. also you will be assigned your own fridge and cabinets in the kitchen.
what's offered:
-6 months lease agreement will be prepared and signed upon moving in and eligible to be renewed.
- available move in date: April 1st.
- internet, utilities, on sight laundry, toilet paper, built in mirrored closet in the room, and another closet by the entrance is shared with one tenant for shoes and winter jackets. private fridge and kitchen cabinets.
- shared kitchen items such as cooking pan, cutlery, plates, etc..
- deep cleaning of common areas, and washroom, is done weekly by us (landlords).
- building amenities include: gym, party room, squash court, swimming pool, hot tub, sauna wet and dry.
- parking is available for additional $85 a month.
- our living standards:
- a safe and enthusiastic living space is the achievement, any acts that includes but not limited to, harassment, racism, anger, or disrespect will not be tolerated, and will result in a breach of the lease agreement.
- we all as landlords and tenants are welcome to have friends and family visits at any time. However friends and family sleepovers are only permitted on the weekends.
- also to maximize comfort, common areas such as living room and kitchen are only to be used by us, friends and family are not permitted to use the common space, or the washroom for the purpose of showering, but they are welcomed at anytime to your room.
-we all exercise good hygiene and make sure we clean after the use of kitchen, and common areas. to make sure our place always stay clean and welcoming.
- but deep cleaning is not to be worried about, as it is done by us landlords.
what other expenses are on you for personal use:
- dish soap
- laundry detergent
requirements:
- documentation assessing your annual income, or at least 5 months employment history.
- scan of your last two pay stubs.
- background check.
- liability insurance upon or within the first month of moving in.
feel free to contact me via messenger anytime for additional inquiries, or to schedule a viewing!

Title: Studio in Downtown Toronto for Rent from May 1
Description:
Queen St. West & Spadina area of downtown Toronto:
Basement studio apartment is available from May 1st, 2024.
This apartment is located in a fully renovated (2017) Edwardian townhouse on Augusta Avenue, just north of the trendy Queen St. West. "Vogue has named Toronto's "Queen St. West" the second-hippest district in the world" (Globe and Mail, Dec. 2014) Close to everything - Kensington market, AGO, financial and art districts of downtown, restaurants, shopping, theaters etc. are within walking distance. Perfect for someone who works or studies in downtown
This basement apartment has been recently fully renovated.
It has a contemporary kitchen and appliances (gas range, dishwasher, wall mounted range hood, washer & dryer combo). There's a four-piece bathroom. Heating and cooling - central air with A/C. There's a bistro set in the yard.
The apartment has a street level den with a skylight. The private entrance is from the back alley. Utilities are extra. Street parking is available along Augusta Avenue or nearby streets by the city of Toronto permit.
The owner occupies the upper level apartment.

Title: Currently available: Massive room w balcony - ideal for couples
Description:
Schedule a viewing of this fantastic move-in ready room on Saturday afternoon, March 9, and Sunday morning, March 10. Text 647 869 6908 to set up a viewing of this enormous and charismatic room that is ideal for people who like space and privacy. The room is the size of a studio apartment with a private balcony where you can enjoy the beautiful spring and summer days! The room is very spacious, bright and charismatic with the large private walkout balcony overlooking the garden. The room is in a light-filled 3 bedroom 2nd floor apartment where the kitchen with brandnew appliances and 4-piece bathroom is shared with the 2 other friendly tenants.
The house is steps away from a bus stop and walking distance to the Midland Go Station (~15 min to downtown). You also have access to laundry, including the brandnew laundry machine, that is at the back of the building.
The home is near a fabulous tennis court, splash park, biking and walking trail.
The house is also close to an amazing sandy beach, Bluffers Park, marinas & sailing/yacht clubs. Walking distance to groceries, pharmacy, plaza, Starbucks & Go Station (about 15 mins to downtown by Go). Close to all amenities.
Utilities and wifi included.
Currently available. Can be rented short term or long term.
Parking is available for an additional $100/month.

Title: Toronto 3 Bedroom Furnished Basement for International Students
Description:
Looking for a comfortable and convenient living arrangement for you and your friends?
This fully furnished 3 bedroom walkout basement unit in Toronto Scarborough is perfect for international students!
The walkout basement is newly renovated, large and spacious as if it was the main floor!
With a monthly rent of $3000 utilities are included so you don't have to worry about extra costs.
Each student can have their own room with beds provided, and a full shared washroom , a full kitchen with dining space, living rooms, a washer, and a dryer.
We have a lovely back-yard that you can enjoy during the summer months!
The bedrooms are spacious for desks and more to make it suitable to study from the comfort of your bedroom.
The unit has 2 entrances for extra convince so you can easily enter and exist from wherever you are in the unit!
The location is ideal for those attending universities such as UofT Scarborough, Centennial College, and Seneca College.
Nearby_grocery stores include No Frills, Metro, FreshCo, and Walmart, with public transit and subway stations within walking distance.
For entertainment, there are also malls such as Scarborough Town Center (STC) and Cederbrae Mall, as well as popular fast food chains and restaurants like McDonald's, Tim Hortons, Boston Pizza, and Swiss Chalet
Contact us for more information and to schedule a viewing of this fantastic living space!

Description: Welcome to Sherwood Apartments, situated in an established neighbourhood, close to everything downtown Toronto has to offer. You're right in the heart of it all here. Your new home is located within walking distance of Ryerson and George Brown College, St. Michael's Hospital, Eaton Centre and schools. The TTC is steps from your door and Sherbourne, College, and Wellesley subway stations are all just minutes away.Your renovated rental apartment features a spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances, chocolate parquet floors, and upgraded bathrooms. Title: Private office for 3 people
Address: 4773-4789 Yonge Street, North York, ON, M2N 0G3
Description: Productive workspace 3 persons that comes with everything taken care of. Put Your Business on the Fast Track at the Hullmark Centre.Connect with clients throughout Toronto and across Canada with flexible, serviced office space at the Hullmark Centre. Internal access to Sheppard-Yonge subway station puts you within easy reach of 70 destinations across Canadas capital city, including Oriole Train Station, plus the neighboring city of Vaughan. Road links are also excellent. Highways 401 and 404 are both just minutes away, allowing you to access major business areas across the city and reach out to clients all over the country from Windsor in the west all the way to the Ontario-Quebec border in the east.A landmark building located in the popular Willowdale East neighborhood of Toronto, the Hullmark Centre offers a unique and very flexible working environment. Take as much space as you need from a single desk to an entire floor. Create your own private office or enjoy the flexibility of hot-desking in our social coworking areas. If you need a meeting room, you can book one in seconds with our easy-to-use app. Start the day with a workout at LA Fitness just 3 minutes walk away and end it with a meal at one of the nearby restaurants or a stroll around Willowdale Park. Make a home for your business with 162 sqft of private office space in ON, Toronto - Hullmark Center, ideal for 3 employees. Our medium offices are fully serviced and have everything taken care of - from the furniture to the high-speed WiFi - so you can focus on driving your business forward. Find flexible office space for rent for as little as a day or stay for longer and personalise your space to suit the unique needs of your business.HQ Private Offices include:  Access to our global network with thousands of locations worldwide Highly trained reception and support team Secure, business-grade technology and WiFi Printers and access to admin support Cleaning, utilities, and security Desk space available by the hour, day, or month Regular networking and community events  Easy booking and account management via our app Customisable and flexible layouts Scale up or move locations to suit your needs High-quality ergonomic furniture Additional access to 646 sqft of shared workspace Pricing starts at 1227All images shown in this listing belong to our locations but may not correspond to this specific centre.Enquire now.

Additionally, this impressive apartment building includes modern laundry facilities, new security & fob system,  and engaging community events.Steps from Bathurst Street, residents of Raglan Gardens are conveniently close to shopping, grocers, pharmacies, and an array of popular restaurants. Nature enthusiasts will love living close to several parks including Wells Hill Park and playground, and two ravines with trails and greenspace to explore. This Cedarvale location also offers residents a quick commute with bus, streetcar, and subway stops minutes away.

Our small offices are fully serviced and have everything taken care of - from the furniture to the high-speed WiFi - so you can focus on driving your business forward. Description: Situated in a family-oriented area of Scarborough, Helen Towers is a wonderful rental community located close to several schools, a childcare centre, a community centre, public library, and shopping. The TTC stops outside your door and The Kennedy subway station, the Kennedy GO station, and Scarborough RT are a short walk away – making all parts of Toronto and the GTA easily accessible.All the shopping and entertainment options of Eglinton Town Centre and Eglinton Square are minutes away as well. Centennial College Ashtonbee Campus, Ashtonbee Reservoir Park, Wexford Park and nature trails are all close by.Your bright and spacious, pet-friendly rental apartment features gleaming parquet floors and a private balcony. Put Your Business on the Fast Track at the Hullmark Centre.Connect with clients throughout Toronto and across Canada with flexible, serviced office space at the Hullmark Centre. Take as much space as you need from a single desk to an entire floor. Create your own private office or enjoy the flexibility of hot-desking in our social coworking areas. If you need a meeting room, you can book one in seconds with our easy-to-use app. Start the day with a workout at LA Fitness just 3 minutes walk away and end it with a meal at one of the nearby restaurants or a stroll around Willowdale Park. Make a home for your business with 108 sqft of private office space in ON, Toronto - Hullmark Center, ideal for 2 employees. Our small offices are fully serviced and have everything taken care of - from the furniture to the high-speed WiFi - so you can focus on driving your business forward. Title: All Inclusive, Furnished Single Room Avail. April 1
Description:
**PLEASE READ CAREFULLY**
*If this ad is still up, the room is still available*
SINGLE BEDROOM AVAILABLE - APRIL 1, 2024
ALL INCLUSIVE & FURNISHED
Rent: $775
Looking for a clean, quiet, respectful, MALE INTERNATIONAL student to take over a newly renovated, furnished single bedroom available for rent April 1.
*No pets
Location:
Dufferin and Eglinton -- minutes from 3 bus stops.
- Dufferin bus is 24 hours with frequent busses and is literally 1 minute away and is a 10 -- 15 minute trip to Dufferin station, and from there is another 15 minute trip to Yonge and Bloor.
- Dufferin and Eglinton is 2 blocks away, and the Eglinton bus is generally a quick bus ride to Eglinton subway station, which is the best way to get onto the University/Spadina line and will get you downtown pretty quickly.
Shops:
- No Frills (groceries) a few blocks away (5 minute walk).
- Shoppers Drug Mart a few minutes away.
- Dollarama right next to Shoppers Drug Mart.
- McDonald's and Tim Hortons locations are minutes away on both Dufferin and Eglinton.
- Yorkdale Shopping Mall is a 10 minute bus ride North on Dufferin.
- Dufferin Mall is a 10 -- 15 minute bus ride south on Dufferin and is really close to the Dufferin Subway station.
- There are banks and such along Dufferin and some other great shops.
All Inclusive:
- The rent will include:
*All hydro and utilities
*High-speed Internet
*Laundry (there is a washer and dryer on site)
*Furnishings (please see photos)
The house / room:
- Bungalow with large backyard
- Separate basement entrance
- Newly renovated room
- Newly renovated bathroom
- Updated kitchen
- Laundry on site
- Dining area, which will also serve as a common area
The roommate:
- The basement suite has 2 bedrooms, so it will be shared – currently with a male, Japanese student.
Please feel free to reply to this ad if you are interested and would like to set up an appointment to see the room.
Appointment Availability: weekdays after 6 pm; weekends after 1 pm.
**In your message, please send me some information about yourself - i.e., age, gender, occupation, where you're from, how long you're planning on being in Canada (potential length of lease), etc.** We use this as a pre-screening process before setting up an appointment to ensure you may be a right fit with the current tenant. ** IF THIS INFO IS NOT IN YOUR MESSAGE, YOU WILL NOT RECEIVE A RESPONSE.**
Thanks for your interest!

Title: Room for Rent Downtown Toronto
Description:
2nd floor room for rent asap, looking for someone to move in right away or as soon as they can.The room is furnished with a bed with mattress, desk , and closet built into the wall. The room is large, and there is a kitchen, washroom, and you will share the bathroom with the 1 other male tenant on the floor.
Room is furnished, and for the rent you only pay $925, including utilities. You only have to pay for internet which you share the cost with the other roommate or you can get your own. The room can be also unfinished if you have your own stuff.
This is the best location right on downtown, located in the heart of Kensington Market , Chinatown, walk to Eaton center or U of Toronto, all shops and restaurants and Spadina street cars on the door.
The place has heating and AC, and no onsite laundry, but a laundromat on the corner, a minute walk away.
Please respond for more info, or to set up a time to see the place.

Title: FAB LOCATION -REST OF MARCH -NICE CLEAN DECENT  APTSHARE
Description:
FOR LAST TWO WEEKS IN MARCH. (May or may not be available after that) Could be an option but not sure right at this moment.
NICE CLEAN DECENT AND VERY WELL LOCATED. CENTRAL and RIGHT NEXT TO SUBWAY.
It's a one bedroom apartment. Pretty spacious, especially the bedrom. It is very comfortable and very clean. The bedroom has two beds plus there is a couch in the living room where one can sleep as well.
Share with one lady, clean and very easy going, independent and pretty busy with own projects.
Don't mind if it is a guy or a girl....just as long as you are clean, quiet and respectful. Prefer someone who does not drink (in excess anyway) and that does not do drugs.
Here you will have a place that is clean, quiet, comfortable, cozy and safe. Can provide everything that you might need including linens. Apt. has everything. We will discuss the rent. It will be affordable ... just as long as you are clean, quiet and easy going.
Please make sure to leave a number where you can be reached and we will chat and organize a meeting.
Cheers
PS: Sorry that pictures were not well taken (do not have a good camera/and even worse photographer :) ) and does not show off the size and loveliness of the place..

Title: Downtown Student Residence sublet - Summer Term (May - Aug)
Description:
Looking for a female student to sublet an apartment at Parkside Student Residence.
Fully furnished 1 bedroom downtown !
Available for summer ! starting from May 1 till Aug 20
(May be available a week or so earlier.)
Private bed with study table . Attached washroom with closet and living space. Shared washroom with shower curtains and vent , AC (heating + cooling), Amazing view.
Amenities include access to 24-hour gym, theatre room, games rooms, study rooms, and outdoor terrace, Laundry and Parking facilities
Rent includes all utilities, Wi-Fi, 24-hour security and maintenance.
Additional mandatory meal plan includes 3 quality meals per day at an unlimited buffet.(Hot food, Bakery, Starbucks coffee machines beside a fridge (various coffee creamers + milk options to choose from !)) and so much more !
Amazing student residence experience where various events are hosted (movie nights, fun activities, themed dinners and a lot more !)
Walking distance to University of Toronto, Toronto Metropolitan University, George Brown College, and OCAD .
Few steps away from IKEA and Eaton Centre !
Tim Hortons is attached to the building !
Near to UofT and TMU ! Comes with a quiet study room and leisure room as well .
Nearby TTC , Loblaws, Allan Gardens, Wing Stop, eateries, salons and much more ! Vibrant and colourful atmosphere with a cozy fireplace too !
DM to secure a spot for summer 2024 !

Title: Open plan office space for + 15 people
Address: 4773-4789 Yonge Street, North York, ON, M2N 0G3
Description: Open plan office space for 15 persons available on flexible terms, so you can add space or even move location - wherever you need to be. Put Your Business on the Fast Track at the Hullmark Centre.Connect with clients throughout Toronto and across Canada with flexible, serviced office space at the Hullmark Centre. Internal access to Sheppard-Yonge subway station puts you within easy reach of 70 destinations across Canadas capital city, including Oriole Train Station, plus the neighboring city of Vaughan. Road links are also excellent. Highways 401 and 404 are both just minutes away, allowing you to access major business areas across the city and reach out to clients all over the country from Windsor in the west all the way to the Ontario-Quebec border in the east.A landmark building located in the popular Willowdale East neighborhood of Toronto, the Hullmark Centre offers a unique and very flexible working environment. Take as much space as you need from a single desk to an entire floor. Create your own private office or enjoy the flexibility of hot-desking in our social coworking areas. If you need a meeting room, you can book one in seconds with our easy-to-use app. Start the day with a workout at LA Fitness just 3 minutes walk away and end it with a meal at one of the nearby restaurants or a stroll around Willowdale Park. Make a home for your business with 1076 sqft of open plan office space in ON, Toronto - Hullmark Center, ideal for 15 employees. Our large offices are fully serviced and have everything taken care of - from the furniture to the high-speed WiFi - so you can focus on driving your business forward. Find flexible office space for rent for as little as a day or stay for longer and personalise your space to suit the unique needs of your business.HQ Open Plan Offices include:  Access to our global network with thousands of locations worldwide Highly trained reception and support team Secure, business-grade technology and WiFi Printers and access to admin support Cleaning, utilities, and security Desk space available by the hour, day, or month Regular networking and community events  Easy booking and account management via our app Customisable and flexible layouts Scale up or move locations to suit your needs High-quality ergonomic furniture Additional access to 1292 sqft of shared workspace Pricing starts at 3416All images shown in this listing belong to our locations but may not correspond to this specific centre.Enquire now.

Title: 2 Bedroom House for Rent in Little Italy
Description: Beautiful, renovated 2 bedroom, 2.5 bath house in the heart of Little Italy with lots of natural light and unique charm. The first floor boasts an open concept living room, dining room and kitchen and a powder room. In the living room, you’ll find a unique gas fireplace. On the second floor you’ll find a spacious primary bedroom with a vaulted ceiling and lots of closet space. The main bathroom has a claw foot tub, huge walk in shower, dual sinks and toilet room. The second bedroom and laundry room (washer, dryer & laundry sink) are also on the second floor. In the basement, you’ll find a third bedroom or home office, open living space and the second full bathroom with a big walk in shower. There is floor heating in the kitchen, bathrooms and basement. In the back, you will find private outdoor space with a carport. This house is conveniently located steps away from College St. shops and restaurants. Utilities are not included.

Title: Downtown 2 Bedroom Condo For Rent
Address: 158 Front St E, Toronto, ON M5A 0K9
Amenities: Gym, Pool, Concierge, 24 Hour Security, Bicycle Parking, Storage Space, Elevator in Building
Description:
Wake up, to the sun rising, in this 19th storey condo with a fantastic eastern view of the city.
On the 14th floor the building divides into twin towers and between these towers is an outdoor pool and lounge with absolutely breathtaking views north and south to the lake.
On the 10th floor is a large outdoor BBQ pit facing towards the lake and indoors is a large party room for all tenants to enjoy.
There are also a library and a place to shoot a game of pool. There is a fully equipped 2 storey gymnasium. Scheduled classes in yoga that you can join and I’ve seen notices in the elevator that suggest there are other activities as well.
The condominium is located at the intersection of Sherbourne and Front st East. There is a Cobbs bakery and a nail salon and more retail space not yet leased at ground level.
There is everything you need a within walking distance, St Lawrence Market 5 minutes, the lake and it’s boardwalk 10 minutes, the distillery district 15 minutes. Canadian Opera Company 5 minute walk. Bars, restaurants, theatres, pastry shops, clothing stores, fast food, supermarkets and anything else you need ! Always something to do if you’re bored.
The concierge personnel are always courteous and ready to assist if needed. The management also keeps a close eye out for persons using their condos as AIR BNB as it is strictly prohibited !!
There is quite a diverse population, people from all over the world living here under one roof and you would think that most people do find it to be a very friendly atmosphere!!! It really is a cool place to live.
Parking is available if necessary!
Storage space frequently becomes available on building link which is an on-line form of communication between tenants and u can look for a variety of services. You can also voice complaints and communicate for services required from condo management!
This apt is a long term rental, minimum one year lease required.

Title: 1 room available in a 2 Bed 1 Bath Condo
Description:
1 Room available to rent in a 2-bedroom 1-bathroom condo with a fully equipped kitchen and in suite washer and dryer. Looking for 1 person only, to rent this room for min 1 year.
DETAILS:
Location : 561 Sherbourne St.
Rent : $1400 per month + Utilities (hydro and internet)
Availability from: 1st April 2024
Documents required : Proof of income, Valid ID, 1 reference
You will be sharing the 2 bedroom condo with me. I occupy the other room. I am a Software developer from Maharashtra, India and I have a hybrid work schedule.
The condo is equipped with high speed wifi (1.5 Gbps) and an in suite washer and dryer, and there's an underground parking that can be obtained with extra charges. It is managed by Target Parking.
It is in an incredibly convenient and accessible location with an amazing view. The condominium building is new, built in 2019 and has great amenities such as a gym, games room, movie theatre, outdoor grill station, a party hall and 24-hour security. FreshCo, Tim Hortons and more such stores are located on the ground floor of the building. Public transport is also very accessible from here with a bus stop right in front of the building and TTC subway station is 5 min walk.
The private bedroom is spacious, has a big window with a great view, a closet and the bathroom attached to it (bathroom has two separate entrances). The room is UNFURNISHED. The common areas and the kitchen are well furnished, and the view from the balcony is one to die for(I'm attaching some pictures I took, and you can also see the CN tower from here), and the balcony is great for two people to enjoy your morning or evening coffee.
If interested, please introduce yourself and message me for more details.

Title: 2 Bedroom Apartment Needed
Description:
Quiet tenants looking for two bedroom apartment. One couple and our grandmother. Alot of the apartments are requiring too many documents. We are self employed and new to Canada so it is difficult to show income. Our grandmother is retired and has her pension, and we are hard working. We are the style that do what we say and don't understand all these documents for what purpose. The rent is x amount on set date, and we give agreed upon notice if it doesn't work and we want to move. We are looking for long term. Our wishlist includes: Within 10km+/- of Jane and Eglinton.
No stairs (our grandmother is getting older). Parking. Laundry. Two bedrooms. We are clean and sincere. Just putting this ad out there if anything could work out.
Thanks for reading.
